title: Bughoto (1973) Genesis Portion (Bugotu)
description: Bughoto translation of the Book of Genesis published in 1973. Bughoto is an Oceanic language spoken in the Solomon Islands. Its speakers live on Santa Isabel Island and on the small neighboring Furona Island.
provider: The British and Foreign Bible Society

language.name: Bughotu
language.area: Santa Isabel Island, southeast end from Suma to Horara; Furona Island off Kia District northwest coast.
